Our Portfolio

About Frame Folk

We Tell Stories Through Our Lens

Frame Folk was founded with a simple mission: to capture the authentic emotions and precious moments that make life beautiful. With over 10 years of experience, our team of professional photographers specializes in events photography.

We believe that every event tells a unique story, and our goal is to preserve those stories through stunning imagery that you'll cherish for a lifetime. Our approach combines technical expertise with artistic vision.

500+ Events Captured
10+ Years Experience
100% Client Satisfaction
